tr_quotes.quote: Her günü son günmüş gibi yaşa; telaş etmeden, her anın farkına varıp kendin olarak
tr_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

tr_quotes.quote: Kış soğuğunun ortasında yazı, yazın bunaltıcı sıcağında kışı özlemek yerine, her mevsimi kendi güzelliğiyle kabul et.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Millman

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat o kadar güzeldir ki gördüğümüz her şeyden zevk almak için sadece küçücük bir anımız vardır. O an, tam bu andır.
tr_quotes.author: Neil Pasricha

tr_quotes.quote: İhtiyacınız olan bir sonraki mesaj, her zaman bulunduğunuz yerdedir.
tr_quotes.author: Ram Dass

tr_quotes.quote: Ne oldu diye üzülüp, ne olabilirdi diye merak ederseniz, olanı kaçırırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini bugüne verenlerin dünleri asla harcanmamıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Brendan Francis

tr_quotes.quote: Birine verebileceğimiz en eşsiz hediye dikkatimizdir. Farkındalık sevdiklerimizi sardığında, çiçekler gibi açacaklardır.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Şu anı yaşamak için kapasitesi olmayanlar, gelecek için geçerli planlar yapamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Alan Watts

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi geçmişe giderek bulamazsınız. Kendinizi şimdiye gelerek bulursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Çocuklarımıza hayat hakkında her şeyi öğretmeye çalışırken, çocuklarımız bize hayat hakkında her şeyi öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Angela Schwindt

tr_quotes.quote: Yoğun bir şekilde şu anda yaşayarak geçmişi daha iyi anlayabiliriz ve daha iyi bir gelecek için hazırlanabiliriz.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizden keyif alın, çünkü sizden sadece bir tane var.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün evimize maceralardan, tehlikelerden ve keşiflerden yeni bir deneyim ve karakter ile dönmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

tr_quotes.quote: Her an sanki başka bir an gelmeyecekmiş gibi yaşa.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer tüm kurallara uyuyorsan, bütün eğlenceyi kaçırıyorsun demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

tr_quotes.quote: Bugünü yaşa, yarın çok geç olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Martial

tr_quotes.quote: Ölmek için yaşamak gerekir, unutma. Anı yaşa, yarını da unutma.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Anı yaşa, yarını da unutma
tr_quotes.author: Laozi

tr_quotes.quote: Kopar goncaları henüz vakit varken bugün. Anlamazsın zaman nasıl çabuk geçer. O gonca sana gülücükler saçarken bugün. Bakarsın yarın sararır solar boynunu büker...
tr_quotes.author: Ölü Ozanlar Derneği

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşam felsefemi sordular cevapladım. Sonsuza dek yaşayacakmış gibi düşün, yarın ölecekmiş gibi yaşa.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

tr_quotes.quote: İçinde olduğun anı yaşa; bırak geçmiş, mezarında gerinsin; çeneni havada tut ve çamur göllerinin etrafından dolaş. Terapi için dostlarından medet umma.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen King

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün imkansız görülen güzel şeyler başımıza geliyor. Yaşadığımız güzellikleri fark etmemiz dileğiyle...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her günü son gününmüş gibi yaşa. Pişman olma, eğilme, büzülme, kendin ol!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya yaşamak için tehlikeli bir yer, ama kötü insanlar yüzünden değil, bununla ilgili hiçbir şey yapmayan insanlar yüzünden.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Anı yaşamak lazım, kaç kulaç olursa olsun
tr_quotes.author: Metin Yaltı

tr_quotes.quote: Anı yaşa, değerlendir; bilinmez an sonra ne olacak.
tr_quotes.author: Zekeriya Başgün

tr_quotes.quote: Dünü düşün, yarının hayalini kur ama bugünü yaşa.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Anı yaşa, yarın da gelip geçecek; dün olacak.
tr_quotes.author: Horatius

tr_quotes.quote: Sanki yarını görmeyecekmişsin gibi yaşa. Sanki sonsuza dek yaşayacakmış gibi öğren.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Güne iyi başla, üzgün olma, nefret etme, daima gülümse, anı yaşa!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dün tarihtir, yarın bilinmeyendir, bugün bir hediyedir.
tr_quotes.author: E. Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişi hatırla. Anı yaşa. Geleceği yaz.
tr_quotes.author: Shaun David Hutchinson

tr_quotes.quote: Dünden ders al. Bugünü yaşa. Yarın için umut et.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Zihnini sürekli anı yaşamaya yöneltirsen sınırsız enerjiye sahip olursun; saat kaçı gösterirse göstersin.
tr_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

tr_quotes.quote: Anı yaşa, sıkıntı olmadığını görünce şaşıracaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmiş için yakınmak, yeni dert edinmek anlamına gelir.
tr_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat bir uykudur, ölünce uyanır insan; sen erken davran ölmeden önce uyan.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Dünden öğren, bugün için yaşa, yarın için ümit et.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Sen doğduğunda ağlarken, diğer herkes gülümsüyordu. Hayatını öyle bir yaşa ki; sonunda herkes ağlarken gülen sen ol.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Hayattan keyif almak için beklemeye gerek yok, bulunduğumuz her anın tadını çıkarmak yeterlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Ne yaparsan yap, nasıl yaşarsan yaşa; ama gülebilmek için birini ağlatma ve çıkarların için hiç kimseyi satma.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Dünü düşün, yarının hayalini kur ama bugünü yaşa.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece bir tane hayatınız var. Şimdi yapmayacaksanız ne zaman yapacaksınız?
tr_quotes.author: Ölü Ozanlar Derneği

tr_quotes.quote: İyi yaşamak için acele et ve şunu bil: Her gün başlı başına bir hayattır.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Günahları terk etmekten daha güzel dua mı var? Sen dünyayı ahirete götüremeyeceğine göre... Öyle yaşa ki dünya seni ahirete götürsün.
tr_quotes.author: Şems-i Tebrizi

tr_quotes.quote: Dün, iptal edilmiş bir çektir; yarın, emre hazır bir senettir; bugün ise peşin paradır. Bugünden yararlanın.
tr_quotes.author: Kay Lydns

tr_quotes.quote: Zaman bir kaset değil, geri sarılmıyor. Anı yaşa!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer inceldiği yerden kopmasına izin vermezsen, gün gelir en sağlam yerinden kopar. Canın yanar, canını yakar.
tr_quotes.author: Sunay Akın

tr_quotes.quote: Şu hayatı öyle yaşa ki; kendi kendini alkışlayasın...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün, hayatımın geri kalan kısmının ilk günü.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Dederich

tr_quotes.quote: Bu senin hayatının en muhteşem anı. Ve sen başka bir yerlere gitmiş, bu anı kaçırıyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kazandığın başarılarda takılı kal ne de hatalarında ısrar et. Bunların yerine tekrar başla; şimdinin her değerli anında yeniden başla.
tr_quotes.author: N. Donald Walscd

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamakta ayak direyeceksin. Belki bahtiyarlık değildir artık, boynunun borcudur fakat düşmana inat bir gün fazla yaşamak.
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat zor lakırdısını bırak bir kenara, olmayan şeylere ah etmekle geçirme günlerini. Yaşa yap istediklerini!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kışın beyaz güzelliğinin de, yazın sıcak ve nemli günlerinin de zevkine var. Her mevsim, her gün, her an gelir geçer ve hiçbiri asla birbirinin aynı ya da tekrarı değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Millman

tr_quotes.quote: Ne yaparsan yap, stres yapma. Anı yaşa!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kimseyi kırmamak ve üzmemek şartıyla dilediğin her şeyi yaşa, bir gün çekip giderken geride ne aklın kalsın, ne de senin yüzünden kırılmış bir yürek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kiminle yaşarsan yaşa, kalbindekiyle yaşlanırsın...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şu anda tek bu an var ve bir daha gelmeyecek.
tr_quotes.author: Francesc Miralles

tr_quotes.quote: Geleceği düşünüp eziyet çekeriz, geçmişi düşünüp geride dururuz, işte bu yüzden, şimdiki zaman elimizden kaçar gider.
tr_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

tr_quotes.quote: Bana kimse yaşamak isteyip istemediğimi sormadı. O halde kimse bana nasıl yaşamam gerektiğini söyleyemez.
tr_quotes.author: Douglas Noel

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen anı yaşamak gerekiyor. Bırakın, bir dakika sonra ne olacağını hayat düşünsün...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamak için bir nedeni olan, her türlü nasıla dayanabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Daha hayatımız başlarken biri bize ölmekte olduğumuzu söylemeli. O zaman hayatımızın her anını dolu dolu yaşardık. Bir yapın da bakın! Yapmak istediğiniz neyse, şimdi yapın! Yarınların sayısı çok değil.
tr_quotes.author: Michael Landon

tr_quotes.quote: Ne yaparsan yap, stres yapma. Anı yaşa!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybetmekten kork, anı yaşa!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi yaşamak için acele et ve şunu bil ki her gün başlı başına bir hayattır.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat, insanlar başka planlar yaparken başlarından geçenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mükemmel anı beklemekten vazgeçtim. İçinde bulunduğunuz anı mükemmel yapın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past, if you are anxious, you are living in the future, if you are at peace, you are living in the present.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: If you’re always racing to the next moment, what happens to the one you’re in? Slow down and enjoy the moment you’re in and live your life to the fullest.
en_quotes.author: Nanette Mathews

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find eternity in each moment.
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Life is available only in the present moment. If you abandon the present moment you cannot live the moments of your daily life deeply.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: My past and my future depends on today.
en_quotes.author: Trevor Hall

en_quotes.quote: Every single moment is your life, so enjoy the moment to enjoy your life fully.
en_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

en_quotes.quote: I always live in the present. The future I can’t know. The past I no longer have.
en_quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

en_quotes.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, worry about the future, or anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Don’t let yesterday use up too much of today.
en_quotes.author: Cherokee Indian Proverb

en_quotes.quote: Be happy and enjoy your sacred time on earth.
en_quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

en_quotes.quote: When you are here and now, sitting totally, not jumping ahead, the miracle has happened. To be in the moment is the miracle.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: The meeting of two eternities, the past and the future… is precisely the present moment.
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: If you do not enjoy a moment, you lose it forever. If you enjoy it, it is yours forever.
en_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

en_quotes.quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
en_quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

en_quotes.quote: Remember then: there is only one time that is important – Now! It is the most important time because it is the only time when we have any power.
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: The first recipe for happiness is: Avoid too lengthy meditation on the past.
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: Enjoy today. It is one of the “good old days” you will miss in the future!
en_quotes.author: Etta Sawyerr

en_quotes.quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Learn from the past to do better in the present so that you can succeed in the future.
en_quotes.author: Jordan Lejuwaan

en_quotes.quote: Stop acting as if life is a rehearsal. Live this day as if it were your last. The past is over and gone. The future is not guaranteed.
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: Living in the moment means letting go of the past and not waiting for the future. It means living your life consciously, aware that each moment you breathe is a gift.
en_quotes.author: Oprah

en_quotes.quote: Plan strategically for a very fulfilling future, but don’t forget to enjoy the beautiful sight of this precious moment.
en_quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

en_quotes.quote: You can’t go back to how things were. How you thought they were. All you really have is…now.
en_quotes.author: Jay Ashe

en_quotes.quote: Living in the moment is being aware of the moment we are in. If our minds are in the past or future, we are not truly alive in the present.
en_quotes.author: Satsuki Shibuya

en_quotes.quote: The more I give myself permission to live in the moment and enjoy it without feeling guilty or judgmental about any other time, the better I feel about the quality of my work.
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
en_quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

en_quotes.quote: No money can buy back the moment that is gone.
en_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

en_quotes.quote: Life is dessert — too brief to hurry.
en_quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

en_quotes.quote: There are only two days in the year that nothing can be done. One is called yesterday and the other is called tomorrow, so today is the right day to love, believe, do and mostly live.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: I have realized that the past and future are real illusions, that they exist in the present, which is what there is and all there is.
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: People like us, who believe in physics, know that the distinction between past, present, and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: I just go to office to enjoy myself ; work automatically happens.
en_quotes.author: Jitendra Attra

en_quotes.quote: We’re so busy watching out for what’s just ahead of us that we don’t take time to enjoy where we are.
en_quotes.author: Bill Watterson

en_quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
en_quotes.author: Amit Ray

en_quotes.quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hahn

en_quotes.quote: There is no distance on this earth as far away as yesterday.
en_quotes.author: Robert Nathan

en_quotes.quote: Awareness is simply seeing without trying to see the end.
en_quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

en_quotes.quote: The only way to survive eternity is to be able to appreciate each moment.
en_quotes.author: Lauren Kate

en_quotes.quote: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: Living in the present moment creates the experience of eternity.
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Forever is composed of nows.
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: The power for creating a better future is contained in the present moment: You create a good future by creating a good present.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Don’t let the past steal your present.
en_quotes.author: Cherralea Morgen

en_quotes.quote: This is real freedom – the ability to enjoy the choices we make in every successive moment of the present.
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Stress is the distance between where your thoughts are and where your life is happening.
en_quotes.author: Dean Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Nothing has happened in the past; it happened in the Now. Nothing will ever happen in the future; it will happen in the now.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
en_quotes.author: Amit Ray

en_quotes.quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past, if you are anxious, you are living in the future, if you are at peace, you are living in the present.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: If you’re always racing to the next moment, what happens to the one you’re in? Slow down and enjoy the moment you’re in and live your life to the fullest.
en_quotes.author: Nanette Mathews

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find eternity in each moment.
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Life is available only in the present moment. If you abandon the present moment you cannot live the moments of your daily life deeply.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: My past and my future depends on today.
en_quotes.author: Trevor Hall

en_quotes.quote: Every single moment is your life, so enjoy the moment to enjoy your life fully
en_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

en_quotes.quote: I always live in the present. The future I can’t know. The past I no longer have.
en_quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

en_quotes.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, worry about the future, or anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Be happy and enjoy your sacred time on earth.
en_quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

en_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: The first recipe for happiness is: Avoid too lengthy meditation on the past.
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: Enjoy today. It is one of the “good old days” you will miss in the future!
en_quotes.author: Etta Sawyerr

en_quotes.quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Learn from the past to do better in the present so that you can succeed in the future.
en_quotes.author: Jordan Lejuwaan

en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.author: Oprah

en_quotes.author: Satsuki Shibuya

en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

en_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

en_quotes.author: Amit Ray

en_quotes.author: Lauren Kate

en_quotes.quote: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: Living in the present moment creates the experience of eternity.
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Forever is composed of nows.
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: The power for creating a better future is contained in the present moment: You create a good future by creating a good present.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Don’t let the past steal your present.
en_quotes.author: Cherralea Morgen

en_quotes.quote: This is real freedom – the ability to enjoy the choices we make in every successive moment of the present.
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Stress is the distance between where your thoughts are and where your life is happening.
en_quotes.author: Dean Jackson

en_quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
en_quotes.author: Amit Ray

en_quotes.quote: The past is gone, the future is not yet here, and if we do not go back to ourselves in the present moment, we cannot be in touch with life.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Life is a preparation for the future; and the best preparation for the future is to live as if there were none.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Happiness, not in another place but this place… not for another hour, but this hour.
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but thought about it.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, look to tomorrow, rest this afternoon.
en_quotes.author: Charles M

en_quotes.quote: Eternity belongs to those who live in the present.
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

en_quotes.quote: Today is life – the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today.
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Life is a great and wondrous mystery, and the only thing we know that we have for sure is what is right here right now. Don’t miss it.
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: What is the biggest thing that stops people from living their lives in the present moment? Fear – and we must learn how to overcome fear.
en_quotes.author: Brian Weiss

en_quotes.quote: I don’t know who my grandfather was; I am much more concerned to know what his grandson will be.
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice, a repetitive one.
en_quotes.author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

en_quotes.quote: Why not just live in the moment, especially if it has a good beat?
en_quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

en_quotes.quote: When you try to control everything, you enjoy nothing. Sometimes you just need to relax, breath, let go and live in the moment.
Rejoice in the things that are present; all else is beyond thee.
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness.
en_quotes.author: James Thurber

en_quotes.quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It’s not only the scenery you miss by going too fast – you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
en_quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

en_quotes.quote: Unlike man, a dog lives every moment and dies only once.
en_quotes.author: Tapan Ghosh

en_quotes.quote: The great science to live happily is to live in the present.
en_quotes.author: Pythagoras

en_quotes.quote: Be happy in the moment, that’s enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
en_quotes.author: Mother Teresa

en_quotes.quote: In rivers, the water that you touch is the last of what has passed and the first of that which comes; so with present time.
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: Enjoy life. There’s plenty of time to be dead.
en_quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

en_quotes.quote: When you are measuring life, you are not living it…
en_quotes.author: Mitch Albom

en_quotes.quote: If you live in fear of the future because of what happened in your past, you’ll end up losing what you have in the present.
Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Eternity is not something that begins after you are dead. It is going on all the time.
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

en_quotes.quote: Stop seeking out the storms and enjoy more fully the sunlight.
en_quotes.author: Gordon B

en_quotes.quote: Live in the moment—not just for the future moment.
en_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

en_quotes.quote: If you must look back, do so forgivingly. If you must look forward, do so prayerfully. However, the wisest thing you can do is to be present in the present. Gratefully.
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: We know nothing of tomorrow; our business is to be good and happy today.
en_quotes.author: Sydney Smith

en_quotes.quote: Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe, and love as long as you live.
en_quotes.author: Rachel Ann Nunes

en_quotes.quote: Learn from the past, prepare for the future, live in the present.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Monson

en_quotes.quote: Live today. Not yesterday. Not tomorrow. Just today. Inhabit your moments. Don’t rent them out to tomorrow.
en_quotes.author: Jerry Spinelli

en_quotes.quote: The past, the present and the future are really one: they are today.
en_quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

en_quotes.quote: And in the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: The key to enjoying the moment is to always carry a list of “Things I Gotta Do That Can Wait.”
en_quotes.author: Robert Brault

en_quotes.quote: Live in the present and make it so beautiful that it will be worth remembering.
en_quotes.author: Ida Scott Taylor
